title: Sexcapades: Petunia and the Pearl Diver
description: The pearl diver needs a working girl to rouse his body. Petunia needs the money from his pearls to save her family. A night at a London brothel is supposed to fix each other's problem. But walking away might become impossible when one night leaves them both craving moreâ€¦and more.
author: Suzi Love
